content.rendered:
Directed by Hugo Blick.

Written by Hugo Blick.

Cast  Emily Blunt( Cornelia Locke ) . Tom Hughes( Thomas Trafford ) . Steve Wall( Thin Kelly ) . Stephen Rea( Sheriff Robert Marshall ) . Valerie Pachner( Martha Myers ) . Malcolm Storry( Red Morgan ) . Nicholas Aaron( Billy Myers ) . Miguel Alvarez( Timothy Flynn ) . Walt Klink( Jed Myers ) . William Belleau( Kills on Water ) . Cristian Solimeno( Clay Jackson ) . Tadhg Murphy( Tap O’Neil ) . Rafe Spall( David Melmont ) . Julian Bleach( Jerome McClintock ) . Jan Knightley( Captain Clegg ) . Rod Rondeaux( Trooper Charlie White ) . Corey Bird( Young White Moon ) . Sam Alexander( Trooper Scott ) . Tonantzin Carmelo( Touching Ground ) . Nichola McAuliffe( Black Eyed Mog ) . Kristian Phillips( Madoc Morgan ) . Andy Williams( Sergeant Ellroy ) . Ben Temple( Dutch Van de Lote ) . Gary Farmer( John Clarke ) . Arturo VÃ¡zquez( Evan Morgan ) . Matilda Ziobrowski( Rachel ) . Jimmy Shaw( Cam McKewan ) . Benjamin/ep Victor( Simon ) . Edward Crook( Captain Grann ) . Kimberly Guerrero( Katie Clarke ) . Christian Patterson( Tobias Biskind ) . Maarten Dannenberg( Hans Steiger ) . Tom Godwin( Grover Best ) . CiarÃ¡n Hinds( Richard M Watts ) . Sule Rimi( Captain Knox ) . Jamie Wilkes( Master of Ceremonies ) . Ian Pirie( Keir Grant ) . Jon BermÃºdez( Drew ) . Toby Jones( Sebold Cusk ) . Matthew Zajac( Piano Tuner ) . Nathan Osgood( E.J. Jenson ) . Cokey Falkow( Lead Horseman ) . Sheldon Peters Wolfchild( Red Elk ) . Jack Klaff( Flathead Jackson ) . Stuart Milligan( Major MacKay ) . Forrest Goodluck( White Moon ) . Julian Nicholson( Shotgun at Clarke Farm ) . Alex Walton( Driver at Clarke Farm ) . Christian Stamm( Herr Brubacher ) . Julie Nash( Frau Brubacher )

Language English.

Producers Elinor Blick. Hugo Blick. Emily Blunt. Greg Brenman. Mona Qureshi. NicolÃ¡s Tapia. Daniel Toland. Colin Wratten.

Production All3Media. Amazon Studios. BBC Studios.

 

Number of Seasons 1

Number of Episodes 6

Status OnGoing (2022–)
